content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)

### Electricity Generator at position(x)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position x3)
- Boiler (position y3)
- Offshore pump (position z3)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when accessing non-existent entities
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to access it. In step 85, an attempt was made to get a stone furnace at position (x=4.0, y=4.0), but no such entity was found. Double-check entity positions before accessing them.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
